message: Give me a quick overview of your background.
Yeah, sure, I mean it's kind of a mix really, I've been around design for a while and sort of grown into different roles depending on what was needed, so it's been fairly hands-on across a few areas.
Why did you leave Bright Oak Creative?
I wouldn't say it was one specific thing, it was more about timing and where the agency was heading versus what I felt I should be focusing on, so it made sense to step back and reassess things.
What are you doing as a freelancer right now?

At the moment it's mainly ongoing bits, like supporting a client's brand visuals and then some personal illustration work, nothing too rigid, just keeping projects moving while I figure out the next long-term step.
